alert.note: Alert for Escambia Coastal (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 4:13PM EST until January 01 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Central, Baldwin Central, Mobile Coastal and Baldwin Coastal Counties. In Florida, Escambia Coastal County. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, from 9 AM Saturday to midnight CST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas along the immediate coast and the Mobile Bay causeway/bayway will be the primary locations of dense fog and hazerdous driving conditions will be likely.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
